Title: Survival of the Fittest
Writer: John Wells (developer), Paul Abbott (creator), Etan Frankel, Nancy Pimental
Actors: William H. Macy, Emmy Rossum, Justin Chatwin, Ethan Cutkosky
Plot: Lip is graduating from high school, so Fiona and the family prepare a surprise party for him. Frank wins a bet and uses the winnings to take Lip out for lobster and some quality father/son time.
